Q.4A Agreement statement - I think that you should be able to download or access the content you want for free from the internet
Q.4B Agreement statement - It is easy to find content on the internet for free that would usually be paid for
Q.4C Agreement statement - Content that you download or access online should be cheaper than the equivalent purchased in a physical format (e.g. a CD, DVD, Blu-ray, or VHS)
Q.4D Agreement statement - If you had paid for a digital file you should then be able to share it with others
Q.4E Agreement statement - The rules governing what you can and can't do with content you purchase should be the same for both physical (e.g. a CD, DVD, Blu-ray, or VHS) and online formats
Q.4F Agreement statement - It is wrong to access content online without the creators\artists permission
Q.4G Agreement statement - The price that you pay to download or access content online is generally about right
